snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include a big price cut for the Facebook phone, Google Glass for dogs and Yahoo talking with Hulu.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include a big price cut for the Facebook phone, Google Glass for dogs and Yahoo talking with Hulu.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Inside Google Glass, and a Cyberattack Report
